Name: ConvertTo-HgsKeyProtector
Synopsis: Converts a key protector into a Host Guardian Service key protector.

Name: Export-HgsGuardian
Synopsis: Exports a guardian that contains public keys.

Name: Get-HgsClientConfiguration
Synopsis: Gets the configuration of a Host Guardian Service client.

Name: Grant-HgsKeyProtectorAccess
Synopsis: Grants access to a guardian for a key protector.

Name: Import-HgsGuardian
Synopsis: Creates a guardian object from an .xml file.

Name: New-HgsGuardian
Synopsis: Creates a Host Guardian Service guardian.

Name: Remove-HgsGuardian
Synopsis: Removes a guardian from the guardian store.

Name: Revoke-HgsKeyProtectorAccess
Synopsis: Revokes access for a guardian to a key protector.

Name: Set-HgsClientConfiguration
Synopsis: Modifies the configuration of a Host Guardian Service client.

Name: Test-HgsClientConfiguration
Synopsis: Forces the HGS client to attest against the configured attestation servers.
